scripts.build:windows: npx prisma generate && node src/lib/fix-prisma.js && next build
scripts.dev:css: npm run build:css && npm run copy:css && next dev
scripts.rebuild: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && rm -rf .next && npm install && npx tailwindcss init -p && npm run build:css && npm run dev
scripts.prepare:prod: npm run build:css && npm run copy:css && npm run build:full
scripts.cloudflare:build: node prepare-for-cloudflare.js && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production NEXT_PUBLIC_DEPLOY_ENV=cloudflare next build
scripts.cloudflare:test-edge: cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_DEPLOY_ENV=cloudflare NEXT_PUBLIC_CLOUDFLARE_ENABLED=true next build && next start -p 3001
scripts.cloudflare:deploy: node prepare-for-cloudflare.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NEXT_PUBLIC_DEPLOY_ENV=cloudflare next build && npx @cloudflare/next-on-pages
